entry.em: ..DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY

entry.data:
SHOWERS
AREAS OF DENSE FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

AREAS OF DENSE FOG IN THE MORNING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CALM WINDS

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
